VI.iii.3.B.1.b
.
Varying Development Procedures
Development procedures vary with each case, depending on
the nature of the contest
the evidence of record
the availability of evidence, and
other factors.
Note
:Â  Developing the facts in a contested claim often presents problems that cannot be resolved by applying a specific formula or rule.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart iii, Chapter 3, Section B - Contested Claims Development
citation: Part VI, Subpart iii, Chapter 3, Section B
